projects.title: Control Tower
projects.description: Control Tower by On The Fly is an easy to use management app that helps you run your business while being on the fly.  Fully connect to the On The Fly POS softwares, it allows you to manage your business by  giving you the tools to track your sales, manage employee hours and system access, manage inventory and even manager menus or offerings from your device.  Changes on the mobile app can be reflected on all your POS - its that simple.  This app was created to move at the speed of business and allow you to manage your store where ever you are.
